enWisdom: It is by turning away from the truth that misguidance comes about
Many a cognizance leads to misguidance
The alms-tax of knowledge is its dissemination

Wisdom: ضَلَّ مَنِ اهْتَدَى بِغَيْرِ هُدَى اللَّهِ
enWisdom: He who takes guidance from other than the guidance of Allah has gone astray

Wisdom: ضَاعَ مَنْ كَانَ لَهُ مَقْصَدٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Lost is the one who has a goal other than Allah

Wisdom: ضَلَالُ النُّفُوسِ بَيْنَ دَوَاعِي الشَّهْوَةِ وَالْغَضَبِ
enWisdom: The misguidance of souls is between the impulses of lust and anger

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ ضَلَالَةٍ زُخْرِفَتْ بِآيَةٍ مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ كَمَا يُزَخْرَفُ الدِّرْهَمُ النُّحَاسُ بِالْفِضَّةِ الْمُمَوِّهَةِ
enWisdom: How many a deviation has been embellished by a verse from the Book of Allah just as a bronze dirham is embellished by a coat of silver

Wisdom: لَنْ يَضِلَّ الْمَرْءُ حَتَّى يَغْلِبَ شَكُّهُ يَقِينَهُ
enWisdom: A person will never go astray until his doubt overcomes his certainty
One who seeks right guidance from the deviated, goes astray

Wisdom: مَنْ جَارَ [جَازَ] عَنِ الصِّدْقِ ضَاقَ مَذْهَبُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever turns aside from truth, his path becomes narrow

Wisdom: مَنِ اهْتَدَى بِغَيْرِ هُدَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ ضَلَّ
enWisdom: He who takes guidance from other than the guidance of Allah, the Glorified, has gone astray

Wisdom: مَنْ يَطْلُبُ الْهِدَايَةَ مِنْ غَيْرِ أَهْلِهَا يَضِلُّ
enWisdom: One who seeks guidance from those who do not possess it is led astray

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَهْدَى الْغَاوِيَ عَمِيَ عَنْ نَهْجِ الْهُدَى
enWisdom: One who seeks guidance from the misguided becomes blinded to the course of true guidance

Wisdom: مَنْ عَدَلَ عَنْ وَاضِحِ الْمَسَالِكِ سَلَكَ سُبُلَ الْمَهَالِكِ
enWisdom: One who deviates from the clear tracks ends up following the courses of destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ زَلَّ عَنْ مَحَجَّةِ الطَّرِيقِ وَقَعَ فِي حَيْرَةِ الْمَضِيقِ
enWisdom: One who slips from the highway of the course falls into the perplexity of narrowness

Wisdom: مَنَ عَدَلَ عَنْ وَاضِحِ الْمَحَجَّةِ [الْحُجَّةِ] غَرِقَ فِي اللُّجَّةِ
enWisdom: One who deviates from the clear highway drowns in the depths of the sea

Wisdom: أَيْنَ تَضِلُّ عُقُولُكُمْ وَتَزِيغُ نُفُوسُكُمْ أَ تَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الْكَذِبَ بِالصِّدْقِ وَتَعْتَاضُونَ الْبَاطِلَ بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: Where are your minds straying and your souls deviating [to]? Do you seek to substitute facts for lies and exchange truth for falsehood?
For every deviation there is a cause
